resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81556</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81556</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>8295</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Paint Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre pintura</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist Péinte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Malen Sie Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peignez Le Jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pinte O Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vernici Il Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων χρωμάτων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will learn the components of paint today and long ago and will become more aware of the use of the different paints in the classroom and in general.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños aprenderán los componentes de la pintura de hoy en día y de hace tiempo y conocerán el uso de las diferentes pinturas en la clase y en general.</string>
            <string language="ga">Foghlaimeoidh leanaí faoi chomhábhair péinte inniu agus fadó agus beidh feasacht níos fearr acu faoi úsáid phéinteanna difriúla sa rang agus go ginearálta.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder erlernen die Bestandteile der Farbe heute 
und vor langer Zeit und werden dem Gebrauch der unterschiedlichen 
Farben im Klassenzimmer und im allgemeinen bewußter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants apprendront les composants de la 
peinture aujourd'hui et il y a bien longtemps et se rendront compte de
l'utilisation des différentes peintures dans la salle de classe et en
général.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças aprenderão os componentes da 
pintura hoje e long há e tornar-se-ão mais cientes do uso das 
pinturas diferentes na sala de aula e no general.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini impareranno oggi i componenti di 
vernice e desidereranno fa e diventare più coscienti dell'uso delle 
vernici differenti nell'aula ed in generale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα μάθουν τα συστατικά του χρώματος σήμερα 
και πολύ καιρό πριν και θα γίνουν πιό ενήμερα για τη χρήση των 
διαφορετικών χρωμάτων στην τάξη και γενικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Visuais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti Visive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικαστηκές τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>8295</entry>
          </identifier>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>

        <classification>
